name: Breakout Revisited
description:
Click to set ball into Motion.You have to break all bricks to move to next level.

There are 16 levels and 6 power ups in each level.(Sticky Ball,cannon,free life,red ball, multiball,extrascore).

There are 3 types of bricks.Yellow requires 1 hit to break,red requires 2 hit and stripped red requires 3 hit.

You have 3 lives to cross each level.

Lives replenish to 3 after each round.

Use Arrow Keys to move paddle.Click to launch  ball and set it into motion
